00030 #ifndef CPL_VSIL_CURL_PRIV_H_INCLUDED
00031 #define CPL_VSIL_CURL_PRIV_H_INCLUDED
00032 
00033 #include "cpl_vsi_virtual.h"
00034 
00035 /* NOTE: this is private API for GDAL internal use. May change without notice. */
00036 /* Used by the MBTiles driver for now */
00037 
00038 /* Return TRUE to go on downloading, FALSE to stop */
00039 typedef int (*VSICurlReadCbkFunc) (VSILFILE* fp, void *pabyBuffer, size_t nBufferSize, void* pfnUserData);
00040 
00041 /* fp must be a VSICurl file handle, otherwise bad things will happen ! */
00042 /* bStopOnInterrruptUntilUninstall must be set to TRUE if all downloads */
00043 /* must be cancelled after a first one has been stopped by the callback function. */
00044 /* In that case, downloads will restart after uninstalling the callback. */
00045 int VSICurlInstallReadCbk(VSILFILE* fp, VSICurlReadCbkFunc pfnReadCbk, void* pfnUserData,
00046                           int bStopOnInterrruptUntilUninstall);
00047 int VSICurlUninstallReadCbk(VSILFILE* fp);
00048 
00049 #endif // CPL_VSIL_CURL_PRIV_H_INCLUDED
